name: Retrotron-3000
description: Retrotron-3000 is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a classic box design and retro console buttons, it brings a nostalgic touch to the digital world. Its soldier-like arms and legs provide stability and precision in its movements, while its screen displays a captivating game of Snake. To complete its stylish appearance, Retrotron-3000 is equipped with a cool pair of shades as an additional accessory.
